sub_title: Director - Microsoft Azure Solution Architecture (Pre-Sales - Azure Apps & Infra) | CCIE#35997 (Security)| 4 x Azure | AWS | GCP | Microsoft Certified trainer| Alibaba Cloud MVP
summary:
Amar's International experience spans 22+ years of technology leadership in cloud infrastructure in B2C/B2B areas. Amar has extensive experience with technologies such as Public Cloud, Cloud-native(Kubernetes, containers, OpenStack, SDN), CI/CD, BI, Customer development with developing new technology solutions, Data Engineering, Cloud & DC networking, Virtualisation, Security, Storage, Orchestration, and Automation, Pre-sales, Product, Account, Project and Vendor Management, and International Finance. 

Amar graduated with a C-Level program called Advanced Management Program (AMP) from INSEAD Business School in France (Alumni) and a Driving Growth Through Innovation (DGTI) Management Program from Harvard Business School. In addition, Amar holds an MBA degree from the University of Amsterdam - Business School and a Bachelor's degree in Engineering from Shivaji University(India). On top of all, Amar has a prestigious Cisco CCIE#35997 in Security and cloud  Certifications like Google, Microsoft Azure, Alibaba, Oracle, and AWS Cloud. 

Amar holds Netherlands/EU Passport/Citizenship, has lived over 16 years in The Netherlands, and has served customers across Europe since then.

Amar is ambitious to become a GM/Field CTO and always wants to be a part of a winning team to solve essential promises of customers today and tomorrow and drive customer success.

Specialties:
•	Public Cloud - Azure/AWS/GCP/Oracle/Alibaba
•	Private Cloud - Edge computing/Kubernetes/Docker/OpenStack/FV/Automation
•      Security (Cloud + On-Prem) - Firewalls/ load balancers/VPNs/Security Groups/NACLS/AKANA API
•	SDN Sol. - Vmware NSX-T/Cisco ACI/Juniper contrail
•	Virtualization - Nutanix AHV/Vmware Esxi/Microsoft Hyper-V
•	Core Routing and switching - BGP/OSPF/N7k/N5k/2k/ASR1K/ASR9K/MX/PTX
•	Full stack.Net, C#, Azure SQL Server/Database , CSS3, HTML5, Bootstrap 4, ASP.NET MVC,ASP.NET Web API
•	International Business & Finance, Leadership, Management
•      Keynote Speaker, Panelist, Round table - Global conferences, Meetups and Technical Universities

Certifications:
• Cisco CCIE Security #35997
• Aviatrix Certified Engineer -  Professional / Cloud Ops / Infrastructure as Code
• Microsoft Certified Trainer
• Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
• Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Architect and Infrastructure 2019 Certified Architect Associate
• Alibaba Cloud Associate- Cloud Big Data/Security/Cloud Computing
• Nutanix Certified Professional – Multi-Cloud Infrastructure (NCP-MCI) 5.15
• Nutanix Certified Master (NCM-MCI) - Multi-cloud Infrastructure

awards.title: CCIE #35997
awards.description: The Cisco Certified Internetwork Expert (CCIE) certification is accepted worldwide as the most prestigious networking certification in the industry. Network Engineers holding an active Cisco CCIE certification are recognized for their expert network engineering skills and mastery of Cisco products and solutions.

awards.description: For the best performance.The Star Award winner is nominated by fellow collegaues who choose some one from their mids that they believe sets him/herself apart by the way he/her is doing her job and by that adding value to the organization in one form or the other.
